name: Delcatty
description: The Prim Pokémon. Delcatty prefers to live an unfettered existence in which it can do as it pleases at its own pace. Because this Pokémon eats and sleeps whenever it decides, its daily routines are completely random.

abilities.name: Cute Charm
abilities.description: Once per short rest, you can impose disadvantage on an enemy attack roll of your choice.

abilities.name: Normalize
abilities.description: Every move this Pokémon activates is Normal type.

abilities.name: Wonder Skin
abilities.description: This Pokémon has advantage on all saving throws against being burned, frozen, poisoned, or paralyzed.
